definition: marked by anger or resentment or hostility, black clothing (worn as a sign of mourning), to make or become black
details:
adjective
- marked by anger or resentment or hostility
= example: marked by anger or resentment or hostility
- of or belonging to a racial group having dark skin especially of sub-Saharan African origin
= example: of or belonging to a racial group having dark skin especially of sub-Saharan African origin
- extremely dark
= example: extremely dark
= synonyms: pitch-black, pitch-dark
- being of the achromatic color of maximum darkness
- (of the face) made black especially as with suffused blood
= example: (of the face) made black especially as with suffused blood
= synonyms: blackened
- soiled with dirt or soot
= example: soiled with dirt or soot
= synonyms: smutty
- (of coffee) without cream or sugar
- (of events) having extremely unfortunate or dire consequences
= synonyms: fatal, fateful, calamitous, disastrous
- stemming from evil characteristics or forces
= synonyms: dark
- deserving or bringing disgrace or shame, referring to conduct or character
= example: deserving or bringing disgrace or shame, referring to conduct or character
= synonyms: inglorious, disgraceful, ignominious, opprobrious, shameful
- offering little or no hope
= example: offering little or no hope
= synonyms: dim, bleak
- distributed or sold illicitly
= example: distributed or sold illicitly
= synonyms: bootleg, black-market, contraband, smuggled
- (of intelligence operations) deliberately misleading
= example: (of intelligence operations) deliberately misleading
- harshly ironic or sinister
= example: harshly ironic or sinister
= synonyms: grim, mordant
noun
- black clothing (worn as a sign of mourning)
= example: black clothing (worn as a sign of mourning)
- (board games) the darker pieces
- the quality or state of the achromatic color of least lightness (bearing the least resemblance to white)
= synonyms: blackness, inkiness
- total absence of light
= synonyms: blackness, lightlessness, pitch blackness
verb
- to make or become black
= example: to make or become black
= synonyms: blacken, melanise, melanize, nigrify
